数学模型开创了具有成本效益的早期糖尿病检测时代由于数学建模，简单的血液测试可以比复杂的测试表现得更好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Mathematical-model-ushers-in-era-of-cost-efficient-early-diabetes-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Mathematical-model-ushers-in-era-of-cost-efficient-early-diabetes-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca1c2d11-a96d-4b96-8f79-110ddbb768a8 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 09:13:36 -0500 Mathematical model ushers in era of cost-effective early diabetes detection
新研究挑战直肠检查在前列腺癌筛查中的作用维也纳综合癌症中心、维也纳医科大学和维也纳总医院的一项研究仔细研究了常见检查方法对早期发现前列腺癌的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/New-study-challenges-role-of-rectal-exam-in-prostate-cancer-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/New-study-challenges-role-of-rectal-exam-in-prostate-cancer-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16c535f5-5bf1-4e49-a609-bef184bdc2d5 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 09:07:20 -0500 New study challenges role of rectal exam in prostate cancer screening

产前阿片类药物暴露与免疫相关疾病风险之间有何关联？研究人员比较了产前阿片类药物暴露和未接触过阿片类药物的儿童因免疫相关疾病住院和急诊的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/What-is-the-association- Between-prenatal-opioid-exposure-and-risk-of-immune-lated-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/What-is-the-association- Between-prenatal-opioid-exposure-and-risk-of-immune-lated-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2071dfe5-e721-45a6-afca-40bc4368a280 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 08:18:00 -0500 What is the association between prenatal opioid exposure and risk of immune-related conditions?
由于阿片类药物和解资金的紧张局势加剧，密歇根州解散了种族平等组织民主党州长格雷琴·惠特默(Gretchen Whitmer)领导的政府解散了一个为帮助密歇根州解决有色人种社区阿片类药物过量问题而成立的咨询小组，这导致一些成员感到不满，他们表示自己的工作正在被埋葬。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Michigan-disbands-racial-equity-group-as-tension-mounts-over-opioid-settlement-money.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Michigan-disbands-racial-equity-group-as-tension-mounts-over-opioid-settlement-money.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a392addb-0be0-4c10-9965-2057123cb89a Fri, 19 Jan 2024 08:02:54 -0500 Michigan disbands racial equity group as tension mounts over opioid settlement money
保险并不总是涵盖儿童助听器当医生说她的长子埃默里（Emory）没有通过新生儿听力筛查时，乔伊斯·沉（Joyce Shen）感到非常震惊。埃默里在婴儿时期被诊断出双耳患有严重的感音神经性听力损失，这意味着声音极其低沉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Insurance-doesne28099t-always-cover-hearing-aids-for-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Insurance-doesne28099t-always-cover-hearing-aids-for-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2af329c-4290-41e2-9c27-34155141b4aa Fri, 19 Jan 2024 08:01:07 -0500 Insurance doesn’t always cover hearing aids for kids
在俄克拉荷马州的这个小镇，大多数人都认识被医院起诉的人黛博拉·哈克勒只花了一个多小时就处理掉了麦卡莱斯特地区医疗中心最近向俄克拉荷马州农场社区小额索赔法庭提起的一大堆债务催收诉讼。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/In-this-Oklahoma-town-most-everyone-knows-someone-whoe28099s-been-sued-by-the-hospital.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/In-this-Oklahoma-town-most-everyone-knows-someone-whoe28099s-been-sued-by-the-hospital.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98794e51-2895-4b95-9eac-f425a3ce4759 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 07:59:28 -0500 In this Oklahoma town, most everyone knows someone who’s been sued by the hospital
研究表明 Omicron 变体像前辈一样逃避免疫系统，这表明 SARS-CoV-2 的关键进化特征研究人员比较了 SARS-CoV-2 Omicron 变体在人类细胞系和原代气道培养物中的复制情况，并测量了宿主对感染的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Study-shows-Omicron-variants-evade-immune-system-like-predecessors-suggesting-key-evolutionary-trait-in-SARS-CoV-2。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Study-shows-Omicron-variants-evade-immune-system-like-predecessors-suggesting-key-evolutionary-trait-in-SARS-CoV-2。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c775be9-60b2-48ec-a288-c2b2775de4ea Fri, 19 Jan 2024 06:14:00 -0500 Study shows Omicron variants evade immune system like predecessors, suggesting key evolutionary trait in SARS-CoV-2
